channel.title: Softlayer_provisioning_maintenance_classification on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_provisioning_maintenance_classification on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification service returns available maintenance classifications. Methods getItemCategories getMaintenanceClassification Retrieve a maintenance classification. getMaintenanceClassificationsByItemCategory Retrieve all maintenance classifications. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification represent a maintenance type for the specific hardware maintenance desired. Local id The id of the maintenance classification. Type: integer slots The number of slots required for the maintenance classification. Type: integer type The type or name of the maintenance classification. Type: string Relational itemCategories Type: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category[]

item.title: getItemCategories
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification::getItemCategories Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationObjectMask SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification_Item_Category[]

item.title: getMaintenanceClassification
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification::getMaintenanceClassification Retrieve a maintenance classification. Overview Retrieve an array of SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification data types, which contain all maintenance classifications. Parameters Name Type Description maintenanceClassificationId integer Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_ClassificationObjectFilter Return Values SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Classification[]
